creator: X-Wrist
descriptionHtml:
We believe every human being is valuable and must use their energy to be the best possible version of themselves.

By using their energy in a positive, constructive way - they generate what we like to call - value energy.

X-Wrist is the world’s first Value Energy Platform that allows people to efficiently reclaim expended Human Energy in the form of Energy Value Token Rewards they can spend to their own liking.

We do this by rewarding the energy value people generate with real-world valuable assets, for instant gratification and bursts of motivation.

Then we add on top of it a layer of machine learning and gamification principles to enforce positive, life-improving habits.

Our product consists of two components:
1. X-Wrist Wearable Band (Hardware)
2. X-Wrist Mobile App (Software)

The X-Wrist Wearable Band measures the energy value you generate from health & fitness activities and sends the data to the mobile application.

The X-Wrist App acts as a digital personal coach that adapts, motivates and inspires you to build healthy habits. It gathers the measured data from the band, intelligently processes it and rewards you for your progress.
descriptionShort: Put your fitness & health on autopilot. Get paid for it.

We believe every human being is valuable and must use their energy to be the best possible version of themselves.

By using their energy in a positive, constructive way - they generate what we like to call - value energy.

X-Wrist is the world’s first Value Energy Platform that allows people to efficiently reclaim expended Human Energy in the form of Energy Value Token Rewards they can spend to their own liking.

We do this by rewarding the energy value people generate with real-world valuable assets, for instant gratification and bursts of motivation.

Then we add on top of it a layer of machine learning and gamification principles to enforce positive, life-improving habits.

Our product consists of two components:
1. X-Wrist Wearable Band (Hardware)
2. X-Wrist Mobile App (Software)

The X-Wrist Wearable Band measures the energy value you generate from health & fitness activities and sends the data to the mobile application.

The X-Wrist App acts as a digital personal coach that adapts, motivates and inspires you to build healthy habits. It gathers the measured data from the band, intelligently processes it and rewards you for your progress.
descriptionShort: Put your fitness & health on autopilot. Get paid for it.

title: X-Wrist

creator: X-Wrist
descriptionHtml:
We believe every human being is valuable and must use their energy to be the best possible version of themselves.

By using their energy in a positive, constructive way - they generate what we like to call - value energy.

X-Wrist is the world’s first Value Energy Platform that allows people to efficiently reclaim expended Human Energy in the form of Energy Value Token Rewards they can spend to their own liking.

We do this by rewarding the energy value people generate with real-world valuable assets, for instant gratification and bursts of motivation.

Then we add on top of it a layer of machine learning and gamification principles to enforce positive, life-improving habits.

Our product consists of two components:
1. X-Wrist Wearable Band (Hardware)
2. X-Wrist Mobile App (Software)

The X-Wrist Wearable Band measures the energy value you generate from health & fitness activities and sends the data to the mobile application.

The X-Wrist App acts as a digital personal coach that adapts, motivates and inspires you to build healthy habits. It gathers the measured data from the band, intelligently processes it and rewards you for your progress.
descriptionShort: Put your fitness & health on autopilot. Get rewarded for it.
